test_queries.natural_language: Show users created in the last month
test_queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
SELECT region, COUNT(*) as user_count FROM users GROUP BY region;

test_queries.natural_language: Show users with their recent orders
test_queries.expected_sql: SELECT u.name, o.order_date, o.total FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);

test_queries.natural_language: What's the average order value by region for Q4 2024?
test_queries.expected_sql: SELECT u.region, AVG(o.total) as avg_order_value FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2024-12-31' GROUP BY u.region;
